prerequisite: Only an executioner can take this paragon path.
name: Guild Executioner
text: Executioners who reach the paragon tier have proven themselves more than capable of carrying out assassinations (both clandestine and public) without being caught or killed themselves. For you, simple political assassinations and hired killings begin to lose their luster, because city watchmen or the bodyguards of local merchants rarely challenge your skills. Your abilities are better utilized stalking more powerful quarry—those that threaten the entire world, if not the planes themselves.

features.blindside(11thLevel): If you are hidden from your enemies at the start of an encounter, you gain a +4 bonus to your first attack roll during the encounter
features.devastatingAssassination(11thLevel): When you use assassin’s strike, increase the extra damage it deals by 2d10
features.executioner'sAction(11thLevel): When you spend an action point to make an attack and you roll a 1, 2, or 3 on any damage die associated with that attack (including extra damage from assassin’s strike or critical hit dice), that die instead deals 4 damage
features.daringEscape(12thLevel): You gain the daring escape power
features.vitalStrike(16thLevel): Your at-will weapon attack powers deal half damage on a miss
features.poisoner'sSecrets(20thLevel): You learn the recipe for the assassin poison wyvern venom
